entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET X509Chain.Build() works on one Windows system but not another #78254
  • Cannot use generic attributes on a struct in Blazor WASM #78255
  • Error MSB3073: dotnet restore failing in CI on FreeBSD #78251
  • LibraryImport with custom StringMarshalling type causes the source generator to keep #78242
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: StringValues implicit conversion to string?[]? causes confusing error with Logging methods #78241
  • Cannot load project after update to 17.4 #78237
  • Potential deadlock in EventListener #78233
    8.0.0
  • New blazorwasm app unable to debug in browser (.net 7.0) - VSCode #78232
    8.0.0
  • crossgen2 `--pdb` does not work #78230
  • Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility 6.0.1 cause CVE-2022-41064 issue #78227
  • ParamName of ArgumentNullException for new FileInfo is incorrect in .NET 7 #78224
    8.0.0
  • plugin - dll not in bin directory #78220
  • Huge Breaking Issue in Net7 with MemberInfo equality #78218
    8.0.0
  • Arithmetic overflow in code, generated by `GeneratedRegexAttribute` #78214
  • Incorrect order of arguments when calling the 'XmlConfigurationElementTextContent' constructor #78212
  • Perf_Timer.AsynchronousContention and Perf_Timer.SynchronousContention benchmark issue on Mono Interpreter #78209
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) in .Net 7 #78206
  • mono runtime using 3rd Party library internal invoke native code lead app crash #78205
  • Use new IndexOfAnyValues throughout dotnet/runtime #78204
    8.0.0
  • Use new IndexOfAnyValues in RegexCompiler and source generator #78203
    8.0.0
  • [Experiment] Modernization of Locks #78202
    8.0.0
  • JIT forgets about a hoisted vector load and emits unnecessary memory reads #78201
  • Generic custom attributes don't work #78200
    7.0.x

Closed

  • MapBackgroundJob for Minimal APIs #78137
  • [API Proposal]: Attribute for mark functions returning rent arrays from some pool #66667
    Future
  • Track CA1849 related diagnostics #57145
    8.0.0
  • TarFile fails to extract even when symbolic link references into the output directory #77303
  • Test failure System.IO.Pipes.Tests.NamedPipeTest_Specific.ClientConnectAsync_Cancel_With_InfiniteTimeout #77802
  • Recursive assembly spec parsing with textual PGO #77971
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.Replace(Span<T>, T, T) #75322
    8.0.0
  • Is it possible to use a AOT dll with a WPF project? #78211
  • gdb fails to load debug symbols for NAOT-ed executable in release mode #78210
  • VectorSingle and VectorDoubleEqualsNonCanonicalNaNTest fails on Mono #74781
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent behavior in NET7 String.Equals #78169
    8.0.0
  • Cannot hit breakpoint when Blazor wasm project path contains special characters #76777
    7.0.x
  • XsltCompiler.Tests Failure #24718
    Future
  • .Net 6/Win11 HttpClient HandshakeFailure TLS issue #77393
  • System.Net.Security.Tests crashed on Alpine.arm32 and OSX.1200 #72227
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Performance regression in many places caused by #77562 #78163
  • Launch Without Debugging Doesn't Block BackgroundService and Whole App but Debug Does #77523
    8.0.0
  • code=killed, signal=ABRT #76987
  • "Namespace" is not a supported Runtime Directive #78185
  • CertificateRequest: when ECDSA named curve is unrecognized, confusing exception raised #72816
    Future
  • SYSLIB1045 Use GeneratedRegexAttribute replaces verbatim string with regular string #78113
  • The "Collection was of a fixed size." exception when configuring options. #77725
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Fix mono dotnet creation #78257
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] React to CheckForOverflowUnderflow in regex source generator #78256
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Simplify `impAssignStruct[Ptr]` and `gtNewBlkOpNode` #78252
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Forcing auto binding redirects on Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests to fix test issue. #78250
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix Equals in hot reload scenario #78249
    area-System.Reflection
  • add README files for Microsoft.Win32.* #78248
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 take 2 #78247
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Delete some `ADDR`-related code #78246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAny in IndexOfHtmlAttributeEncodingChars #78240
    area-System.Net
  • Fix argument exception names in File/DirectoryInfo #78239
    area-System.IO
  • Improve the handling of Create, CreateScalar, and CreateScalarUnsafe for vectors #78236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix bug in String.Equals unrolling for CJK single-char strings #78234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the dotnet (1) man page #78229
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Use `FIELD_ADDR` for all `ldflda`s #78226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Various support changes and cleanups for the jiterpreter PR #78225
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Arm64: Support additional condition checks in select nodes #78223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ArgOutOfRangeException throw helpers #78222
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Don't need to escape special characters anymore #78217
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix justMyCode behavior #78216
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Fix a crash when emitting P_OBJC_GET_SELECTOR opcodes. #78215
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource #78213
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix `--singlemethodname` #78207
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Removing obsolete references to 'emitMaxTmpSize' #78199
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • React to CheckForOverflowUnderflow in regex source generator #78228
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Ensure ReadBufferState resets any BOM offsets every time the buffer is advanced. #78235
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix performance regression in STJ JsonNode instantiations #78147
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78018
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-mono, 7.0.1
  • System.Diagnostics.TraceSource readme small typo #78253
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource
  • System.Diagnostics.EventLog: Add README #78243
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • MemoryExtensions.Replace(Span<T>, T, T) implemented #76337
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Prefer concrete instances instead of gshared ones for met… #78182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix recursive assembly spec parsing with textual PGO #78035
    area-VM-coreclr
  • System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter: Add README #78244
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • System.Diagnostics.TraceSource: Add README #78245
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • Ensure ReadBufferState resets any BOM offsets every time the buffer is advanced. #78221
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C: SetMessageSendPendingException and SetMessageSendCallback #77956
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build (backport of #60675) #77505
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Fix bug in String.Equals unrolling for certain single-char strings #78190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] MiniJIT OP_XEQUAL for floats #77770
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Diagnosing failures #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • Use DOTNET_EnableCrashReport to create dumps #77578
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • fix: [Wasm] Adjust windows build #70689
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [JIT] X64 - Minor optimizations for arithmetic and `not` / `neg` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Transform `STRUCT`-typed uses of primitives in local morph #78131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for CV path. #78044
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [MONO] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix errors being logged multiple times #75947
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Delete `fgMorphBlockOperand` #77688
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding support to receive evaluationOptions from dap. #71464
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes around virtual method hierarchy validation #78157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #78015
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix justMyCode behavior #78066
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add a VN-based dead store removal phase #77990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Use `init-os-and-arch.sh` in mono samples recipes #78055
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fixing memory ordering issue in ConcurrentQueue #78178
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Collections
  • EventListener: Add test for logging a null string in an EventSource #77172
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix support for generic custom attributes. #78091
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Backport pr75366 to 6.0 #77921
    NO-MERGE, area-Serialization

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-11
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Fix yield #2079

Merged

  • Comment out the new frame in FirstFrameInGreenThreadCpp for now #2078
    area-green-threads

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: bring IL backend inline with scanner - use unconstructed type for unbox #2075
  • Fix a few things regarding EC, await, and thread pool local queuing #2067
  • Filament/prolog debug #2069

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Latest VS2022 Preview update breaks everything #29037
  • dotnet nuget update source has user unfriendly behaviour #29026

Closed

  • Changes in Reference project (ProjectB) not reflecting in Referencing Project (ProjectA) #29019
  • dotnet publish -r win10-x64 restores vulnerable package #29028
  • Cannot load or run lots of my projects in my solution after installing .NET 7 #28947
  • dotnet test -r does not fallback on --results-directory anymore #28986
  • dotnet test -p:Platform does not appear to work anymore #29014

PullRequests

Created

  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29036
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ignore outdated workload manifest ID #29035
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Update man pages post 7.0 GA #29032
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • Clean up Razor Server pid file if the path doesn't exist #29029
    Area-CLI
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Fix templating support for multiple parameters with same prefix #29027
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29020
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29018
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Introduce Roslyn-based GenAPI #28967
    Area-GenAPI
  • Fix templating support for multiple parameters with same prefix #29010
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Include ijwhost in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroupOutput #28929
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined (backport #28380) #28782
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2043211 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix TargetPlatformVersion normalization for Windows #29009
    Servicing-consider
  • Detect Corrupt Solution File in Dotnet Sln Add #28811
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify output testing #28994
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29011
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new option for json output of dotnet list package #28564
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Recent changes to ref fields specification #6337

PullRequests

Created

  • ref struct working group notes #6691

Updated

  • Nullability improvements notes 2022-11-07 #6674

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InvalidOperationException from `DiagnosticData.GetAdditionalLocations` #65381
  • CS1998 Code Cleanup Fixer deletes comments at the end of the method #65380
  • IDE0052 is incorrectly reported for a member referenced by nameof(...) #65379
    17.5
  • C#: cdoes not work #65378
  • Improve NRT warning CS8604 in cases where implicit conversions cause the warning #65369
  • Latest LSIF generator explodes failing to find service for ILspHoverResultCreationService #65367
    17.5
  • `CheckFeatureAvailability` should not have side-effects on binding via `hasErrors` in `ForEachLoopBinder` #65363
    17.5
  • Test failed in CI: ExpanderAvailableWhenNotInTypeContextButNotAddingAnyItems #65362
    17.5
  • Use of `static abstract` interface members on .NET 6 produces incorrect error #65361
  • VisualSudio 17.4 and Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* 4.3.1 ignore WhiteSpace in VS-Settings or WorkSapce.CurrentSolution.Options respectively #65360
  • Visual Studio 2022 formatting issue #65359
  • `SetsRequiredMembersAttribute` accepting list of members #65358
  • ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe or devenv.exe could consume a CPU core permanently #65356
    17.5
  • When does AttributeData.AttributeClass return null? #65355
  • Unexpected ref safety error assigning ref of captured local #65353
    17.5

Closed

  • SymbolFinder.FindReferencesAsync doesn't find anything. #44746
    Backlog
  • Consider making IIndentationService public #48452
    Backlog
  • Dynamic order of context menu's causes loss of producitivy #49716
    Backlog
  • ref/out parameters in async methods with AsyncMethodBuilderAttribute #60332
    17.5
  • False negative CS0029 for arrays #65357
  • RuntimeBinderException on inherited interfaces #12995
  • Obsolete diagnostic not reported for type named `var` brought by `using static` #64713
    17.5
  • Quick actions use wrong indent #65375
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33111.100 #65377
  • Add argument name refactoring on commented first arg seems to duplicate comment #63362
    Backlog
  • using alt+enter refactor code, scope:Project translation is missing #38032
    Backlog
  • Spikes in CPU usage when resolving references to methods implementing System.IDisposable #38223
    Backlog
  • Rename Crash #39221
    Backlog
  • Suggested name for class properties now in lowercase #40119
    Backlog
  • Can't rename Enum. Some enum works, but some don't #42131
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent capitalisation in quick fix title: Fix Name Violation #65115
    17.5
  • I received this error just starting Visual Studio 2022 Pro. #65123
    17.5
  • Xml Doc dropdowns do not list inherited class members #65351
  • `IDE2000` and `IDE2003` are passing wrong titles #60621
    Backlog
  • Negative number in pattern matching #65338
    17.5
  • F1 on `unmanaged` and `notnull` constraints leads to completely unrelated documentation #65311
    17.5
  • F1 help on `switch` keywords always opens documentation about switch statements #65312
    17.5
  • 'when' keyword is not suggested after any pattern in switch expression #44480
    Backlog
  • Remove dependency on Editor and EditorFeatures from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer.Protocol project #55142
    Backlog
  • Filter out File-scoped types from ImportCompletion #65339
    17.5 P2

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flaky test #65383
    Area-IDE
  • Fix reading indent style and indent size from VS settings #65382
    Area-IDE
  • Stop shipping `-vs-deps` branches #65376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.5 #65374
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main-vs-deps back to main #65373
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix a NullReferenceException in Signature help #65372
    Area-IDE
  • Add additional cases whre 'use coalesce expression' can simplify code. #65371
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65370
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enable StackOverFlowTest #65368
    Area-IDE
  • Complete all foreach binding checks despite LangVer check #65366
    Area-Compilers
  • Implicitly-typed lambda parameters have RefKind.None #65350
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix bug in partial solutions after a document was removed and added #65349
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add tests for an issue around constrained calls #65364
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Rectify async checks logic in presence of AsyncMethodBuilder attribute #65352
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Allow reordering parameters, inserting, and deleting parameters #64596
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Report obsolete diagnostics for types named var/unmanaged/notnull #64717
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix trivia handling in 'use named arguments' refactoring #63366
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Make the impls of the 'use coalesce expression' features more consistent. #65365
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65340
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix two quick actions title #65289
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add F1 help keyword for `notnull` and `unmanaged` constraints and `switch` expressions #65341
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure 'when' keyword shows up in a filter-clause in a switch pattern. #65346
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move findusages service implementations down to features #65348
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Fix LSP workspace diagnostics exception when a solution contains a project with no file path #65328
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Exclude type declared as `file` from import completion #65342
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Improve `NormalizeWhitespace` for object initializers #65249
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Report structural lambda `params` errors #64960
    Area-Compilers
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers, Blocked
  • Refine error recovery in the parser around top level statements #65262
    Area-Compilers
  • Better infer tuple type for `Fix return type` codefix #65335
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enhances the set of cases 'use pattern matching' works for. #65314
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure emit layer doesn't ignore diagnostics and dependencies for well known members. #65320
    Area-Compilers
  • Attempt an alternative implementation of AsyncQueue #65080
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix ArgumentNullException under a race condition in analyzer driver #65083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, OnDeckForServicing
  • Re-enable navigate-to streaming with IAsyncEnumerable. #65244
    Area-IDE
  • Optimize codegen for tuple swap scenarios #65327
    Area-Compilers
  • Rules missing documentation #62242
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Report analyzer telemetry for lightbulb code path in OOP #65212
    Area-Analyzers
  • Don't report diagnostics if code-style option is disabled #62497
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable NRT in analyzers layer #63090
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • inheritdoc order fixes #54494 #54618
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Revert "Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data"" #64892
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Debugging in VS Browser KeepAlive #45041
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Invoking endpoint filter but not handler on argument error causes VoidTaskResult to be written to the response body #45040
  • Results.File and Results.Stream consume large amount of Memory, don't stream file directly anymore #45037
  • SocketTransportFactory should implement IConnectionListenerFactorySelector publically #45035
  • Unhandled exception rendering component: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'insertBefore') #45034
  • Explicitly de-dupe ReferenceCopyLocalPaths in Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.csproj #45033
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WASM stuck in infinite Http Request Loop #45032
  • There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #45031
  • dotnet-getdocument issues in .NET7 #45025
  • MicrosoftIdentityOption.ReturnUrlParameter does not appear to work #45024
  • Unable to configure HTTPS endpoint #45023
  • HostingStartup failed to execute after updating to .net 7/asp.core 7 on Azure App Service #45022
  • Enable http/3 from docker containers #45021
  • Perf regression: fortunes, multiple_queries, plaintext_actix #45020
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction #45019
  • Blazor User Blocked from Downloading DLL Files #45018
  • Shadow copy directory in inconsistent state after reboot #45017
  • OutputCaching not returning API version headers #45016
  • OutputCache Attribute does not support Tags #45015
  • CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character #45014

Closed

  • Limit Buffering in ConnectionHandler while forwarding Data? #44975
  • Exception from Kestrel Webserver in Net7 #45029
  • .NET Core 7 Output Cache does not work with app.UseEndpoints() properly #44739
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor Server On Connection Authentication #44820
  • Cannot receive push data from API when build app release with proguard android #44993
  • Blazor JS Interop is bugged in an hard to reproduce scenario. #44927
    Backlog
  • Support Declarative Shadow DOM in Razor/Blazor files #44986
  • ASP.Net Core 7 Program.cs throws exception with Serilog log path #44958
  • Update to the latest Bootstrap version #43096
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Wasm: Antivirus rejects files written to cache, despite DLL bundling #40139
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Long delay for request to start while debugging and another request is waiting #44940

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Restore IISServerSetupFilter server type check #45036
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [Blazor] Workaround linker regression #45028
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Fix predicate evaluation in OutputCacheAttribute #45027
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime
  • Use restore.cmd to Restore the Project #45026
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Removing duplicated semi-colons #45038
    8.0-preview1
  • Fix predicate evaluation in OutputCacheAttribute #45013
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Add template for analyzer/codefixer proposals #45009
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Experiment with named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
  • [main] Match strangely formatted PathBase in HttpSys & IIS #42751 #45011

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Auto theme change doesn't behave as expected on .NET 7 whereas the same works fine on .NET 6 #11299
  • Entry crashing on iOS #11298
  • map.MapElements.Clear() does not work on iOS #11296
  • Android adaptive app icons are generated "incorrectly" #11295
  • Add support for controlling the "compat" app icon shape #11293
  • Signed apks not working on real devices but working on emulators #11292
  • .NET MAUI Icon Stretched #11291
  • MAUI project : FlyoutBackgroundColor and FlyoutBackground not working on windows when the FlyoutBehavior is locked after upgrade from 17.3 to 17.4 #11288
  • ListView in MacCatalyst is slow and render incorrectly when scroll back / up #11287
  • Setting SetSoftInputMode to AdjustResize on Android breaks modal layouts (and probably more) #11286
    Backlog
  • Alt+Tab Causes Search bar via CTRL+F in top of the screen #11285
  • Unable to create MAUI project #11284
  • Native embedding: Consuming ResourceDictionary throws ArgumentNullException on iOS and Android #11283
    Backlog
  • MAUI Application not properly recompiled #11282
  • Native embedding: OnAppearing override not invoked #11281
    Backlog
  • Ios build fails in Azure #11278
  • App crash when recover run android app from device desktop #11277
  • iOS app crashes using TestFlight #11276
  • .NET MAUI does not work with Android 13 Android.permission.write_external_storage #11275
    Backlog

Closed

  • iOS and Android AppIcon generate icons with different sizes. #10572
    Backlog
  • ToolbarItem with FontImageSource has different colors on Android and Windows #6162
    Backlog
  • Pages with no title hides shell menu #6703
    Backlog
  • MAUI-Android-Release package compiled under W11 not working #11201
  • Measure not working correctly on Layouts with fixed size constraints #7531
    7.0-rc2
  • Layout is not updated with a grid with auto row height if row becomes larger in Windows #10304
    Backlog
  • 在Entry和Editor上输入，取消焦点和离开当前页后，键盘依然显示，并且影响页面。 #7588
  • Error HE0046: Failed to install the app ... simctl returned exit code 1 #10998
  • dotnet tool restore on Net7 repo Get error : blocked #10519
  • Android Crashes when removing an Item from ObservableCollection that is used as ItemSource in ListView #8912
    Backlog
  • Java.Lang.NullPointerException: boolean android.view.View.isInLayout() #10867
    Backlog
  • Device Idiom detects Windows as tablet #11126
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Bug] PNG Image set to Application Icon for MAUI Application loses transparency. #2564
  • Windows Platform All Visual Assets #7387
  • No icon generated for older Android Devices #7556
  • BaseSize on .svg files is not supported #9716
  • Android Resource file is not included in the app build #8831

PullRequests

Created

  • Add 7.0 (GA) to the list #11294
  • Merge net7.0 into main #11290
  • Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11289
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.5 to 1.2.221109.1 #11280
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Bump System.CodeDom from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 #11179
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Merge net7 #11279
  • Merge net7 to main #11202
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Remove dead IScreenshotResult XML Doc link #11233
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add nicer metadata to our NuGet packages #11219
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix tablet mode detection #11135
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, backport?

Updated

  • Clean up the files in the xml-docs artifacts #11257
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Try creating workload packs instead #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Bump Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 #11193
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 6.0.6 to 7.0.0 #11190
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758

  • CodeQL only on main/non-public builds #11273
